         if (memo(current, code) ==0) cycle

         a = (code /16) mod4

The code outline:

program main

   implicit none

   integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007

   integer :: N

   character(1), dimension(0:3) :: chars = ['A', 'C', 'G', 'T']

   integer :: memo(0:800, 0:63) = 0 ! assuming N up to 800

   integer :: result

   character(len=20) :: s

   ! Read N

   read(*,*) N

   ! Initialize memo

   memo(0, 63) = 1 ! TTT is code 3*16 +3*4 +3 = 63

   ! Fill memo

   integer :: current, code, a, b, c, d, new_code

   character(len=4) :: original, s0, s1, s2

   do current =0, N-1

      do code =0, 63

         if (memo(current, code) ==0) cycle

         a = (code /16) mod4

         b = (code /4) mod4

         c = mod(code,4)

         do d=0,3

             ! Check validity of a,b,c,d

             original = chars(a)//chars(b)//chars(c)//chars(d)

             if (index(original, 'AGC') /=0) then

                 cycle

             end if

             s0 = chars(b)//chars(a)//chars(c)//chars(d)

             if (index(s0, 'AGC') /=0) cycle

             s1 = chars(a)//chars(c)//chars(b)//chars(d)

             if (index(s1, 'AGC') /=0) cycle

             s2 = chars(a)//chars(b)//chars(d)//chars(c)

             if (index(s2, 'AGC') /=0) cycle

             ! valid

             new_code = b*16 + c*4 + d

             memo(current+1, new_code) = modulo(memo(current+1, new_code) + memo(current, code), MOD)

         end do

      end do

   end do

   ! Compute the total

   result =0

   do code=0,63

      result = modulo(result + memo(N, code), MOD)

   end do

   ! Convert result to string

   write(s, '(I0)') result

   ! Process second program

   ! count uppercase and lowercase

   integer :: uppercase=0, lowercase=0

   character(len=20) :: s2 = s

   do i=1, len_trim(s)

      c = s(i:i)

      if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then

         uppercase = uppercase +1

      else if (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z') then

         lowercase = lowercase +1

      else

         lowercase = lowercase +1 ! digits, symbols etc.

      end if

   end do

   if (uppercase > lowercase) then

      do i=1, len_trim(s)

         c = s(i:i)

         if (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z') then

            s2(i:i) = achar(ichar(c) - 32)

         end if

      end do

   else

      do i=1, len_trim(s)

         c = s(i:i)

         if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then

            s2(i:i) = achar(ichar(c) + 32)

         end if

      end do

   end if

   ! Process third program: replace commas with spaces

   character(len=20) :: s3 = s2

   do i=1, len_trim(s2)

      if (s2(i:i) == ',') then

         s3(i:i) = ' '

      end if

   end do

   ! Output s3

   print *, trim(s3)

end program main
